analysis: The project is a web application that needs an Egyptian-themed UI with light desert colors, mobile responsiveness, and functional buttons. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the website. The existing to-dos indicate that the mobile menu and navigation need improvement, and the CSS needs to be updated with Egyptian-themed colors and patterns.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette including sandy beige, golden yellow, deep blue, and earthy brown. Add CSS classes for Egyptian patterns and motifs.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML file are functional and properly linked. Add hover effects and transitions for better user interaction.
Implement mobile menu toggle functionality with smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions. Ensure the hamburger menu works correctly on mobile devices.
Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns and ensure it is correctly applied to the UI elements.
